parameters.name: DedicatedClusterId
parameters.description:
The ID of the cluster.

>  You must specify one of the **InstanceId** and **DedicatedClusterId** parameters.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the instance.

>  You must specify one of the **InstanceId** and **DedicatedClusterId** parameters.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region in which the Data Transmission Service (DTS) instance resides.
